comment.author: 46512523@N06
comment._content:
Nord 1100
Messerschmitt Bf 208 is a upgraded version of Bf 108 (tricycle undercarriage)
Two prototypes built
Destroyed by US raid
French post war production by Societe Nationale Construction Aeronautique du Nord
(SNCAN) as Nord 1100  (260 Hp inverted inline 6cyl Renault engine)
:=) :=)
